programme.desc:
Qu'un sang impur...: Directed by Abdel Raouf Dafri. With Johan Heldenbergh, Linh Dan Pham, Lyna Khoudri, Steve Tientcheu. While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a real powder keg in the hands of the rebels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9348690/","name":"Qu'un sang impur...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJhMTI0YWYtMzVjYi00ZjRiLTk1MTAtY2U5ZTRlYjA0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIwMzA0NTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a re","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9348690/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"saurabhyadav13"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Film. Historical and Gripping","reviewBody":"I think this movie is easily one of all-time Top 10 War films, and I'm not French or Algerian.

Nothing is predictable or black and white here, so realistic and gritty, the locations and actors are very authentic.

The characters pull you into their lives and the dialogue shines through even as subtitles. There are no winners in a war and the films shows it very well, makes you want to find out more about what happened in Algeria in 1960.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":319,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2020-01-22","keywords":"french algerian war,algerian war,sniper,torture,renegade commander","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce Teaser [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3241525017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBiZDBiMWUtZDhjMS00ZTA5LWFjOWItMTQyYzMwYmM4NTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBiZDBiMWUtZDhjMS00ZTA5LWFjOWItMTQyYzMwYmM4NTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0374949/","name":"Johan Heldenbergh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0199006/","name":"Linh Dan Pham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6891947/","name":"Lyna Khoudri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0593456/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729612/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc:
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dr_Sagan"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well balanced movie...","reviewBody":"W.T.F. is a movie which tries to belong in too many genres simultaneously, including Comedy, Drama, Romance, War, Action, Documentary, and has a statement to make about pretty much everything including long-distance relationships, politics, professionalism, cultural differences etc. etc.

Without excelling in any of that, it manages to be a well balanced movie in the 110 minutes of its duration.

Tina Fey plays Kim Barker, a real person and an actual journalist, who is dissatisfying from her career covering low profile stories, and decides to go to Afghanistan as a war correspondent for a few months, or so she thought...

The movie has a good structure. It starts as a comedy, something you might expect because of the main actress, but soon the situations become real and more dramatic.

The rest of the cast includes well known actors like Alfred Molina, Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman and Margot Robbie.

Overall: Don't expect a comedy because of Tina Fey. It starts like that but it evolves to other genres really quick. It might not be a great movie but it's not boring and you get something out of the inner journey of the protagonist. IMDb data; ttnr: 3553442, Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, --- Description: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Dr_Sagan","dateCreated":"2016-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well balanced movie...","reviewBody":"W.T.F. is a movie which tries to belong in too many genres simultaneously, including Comedy, Drama, Romance, War, Action, Documentary, and has a statement to make about pretty much everything including long-distance relationships, politics, professionalism, cultural differences etc. etc.

Without excelling in any of that, it manages to be a well balanced movie in the 110 minutes of its duration.

Tina Fey plays Kim Barker, a real person and an actual journalist, who is dissatisfying from her career covering low profile stories, and decides to go to Afghanistan as a war correspondent for a few months, or so she thought...

The movie has a good structure. It starts as a comedy, something you might expect because of the main actress, but soon the situations become real and more dramatic.

The rest of the cast includes well known actors like Alfred Molina, Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman and Margot Robbie.

Overall: Don't expect a comedy because of Tina Fey. It starts like that but it evolves to other genres really quick. It might not be a great movie but it's not boring and you get something out of the inner journey of the protagonist. How easy is to feel unnatural situations as normal when you are a long way from home...","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-04","keywords":"afghanistan,journalist,karaoke,dancing,infidelity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132324889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the Kim Barker's memoir, Tina Fey plays a journalist reporting from war-town Afghanistan and Pakistan.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275486/","name":"Tina Fey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013731/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199243/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061622/","name":"Robert Carlock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5092324/","name":"Kim Barker"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

Bik Eneich
programme.desc: Bik Eneich: Un fils: Directed by Mehdi Barsaoui. With Sami Bouajila, Najla Ben Abdallah, Youssef Khemiri, Noomen Hamda. 11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10749760/","name":"Bik Eneich: Un fils","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFlM2U3ZDItMDEzNC00YjhkLTkyMmUtMjY2Yjg1MDdiY2MyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgzMjQ0MTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10749760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mbrcf"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid film from a new voice in Arab cinema","reviewBody":"If you enjoy Asghar farhadi's films, then this is the right film for you. The script follows exactly the method of an unfortunate accident causing turmoil and chaos in a seemingly healthy family and then things start becoming interesting, secrets deeply buried surface, old forgotten grudges start to poke and so on.\n\nEven though it's a directorial debut of Mehdi Barsaoui, The film is really well made, there are some scenes that you would only expect from masters of filmmaking. Without trying to spoil any parts of the story, my only issue was that the film puts finger on so many conflicts, whether political, cultural or religion related in a rather short runtime (96 minutes) and the inevitable is that many ascepts, some really important ones, are left out or just briefly mentioned. I think this is caused by the ambitious mentality of the director as he tried do to score as high as possible. Yet still this is a good film from a new voice.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":811,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-11","keywords":"troubled family,father son relationship,mother son relationship,husband wife relationship,tunisian lebanese production","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872529433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098793/","name":"Sami Bouajila"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5858261/","name":"Najla Ben Abdallah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10923123/","name":"Youssef Khemiri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039666/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0246993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002052/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Waters
Terminator: Mroczne przeznaczenie
Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: Dark Waters: Directed by Todd Haynes. With Mark Ruffalo, Anne Hathaway, Tim Robbins, Bill Pullman. A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9071322/","name":"Dark Waters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0M2Y5M2QtZGIwMC00MzJjLThlMzYtNmE3ZTMzZTYzOGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9071322/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"statuskuo"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Corporation Does Not Factor Humanity","reviewBody":"There's nothing here that you have not seen. Go ahead and call it "Aaron Brockovich." But director Todd Haynes still makes it entirely engaging and painfully true that death is a number compared to liability and that is how you can sustain cold hearted industry. Made more gut wrenching is how they believed the ends justified the means. Mark Ruffalo tackles the lawyer with the conscience wonderfully. Suffering under the weight of what he must do and what then envelops his small world. It's heroic in how much he does sacrifice and let's face it, these stories don't end well. What director Haynes does is put a face to the not-on-the-books crime. And though, it only is a civil case somehow you sense the frustration of the town. Not played as rubes but believing that a massive corporation who funded and gave perks to sustain the village wouldn't willingly destroy it. As we know now versus 1998, they knew...if not for simple morbid curiosity. Then sat on the information as it fed the machine decades later, we are now more informed and much more paranoid. Everything we eat or touch or...breathe we are closer to death. I was in that area in 1998...and the news then spent less time on it then I recall. As a college bound student, I heard murmurs of DuPont and jokes were made of this. Now...it seems bitterly grim. How many lives were destroyed because of shady dealings. When you peel the onion, you do weep. I love this flick. The flavor of that era is pitch perfect. The backroads of an industrial town, built under poor chemistry just sweats disease. And you walk out angered by it. The fight continues to this day.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"environmental pollution,water pollution,lawyer as protagonist,chemical pollution,chemical contamination","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3717512985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZDdmMGMtN2I4ZC00NDFiLTlkNWUtY2YxM2MzNjU0NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZDdmMGMtN2I4ZC00NDFiLTlkNWUtY2YxM2MzNjU0NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by the true story of Robert Bilott, an attorney who took on the DuPont company in an environmental suit exposing a decades-long history of chemical pollution in drinking water."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0749263/","name":"Mark Ruffalo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0783031/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484360/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10164264/","name":"Nathaniel Rich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3918350/","name":"Mario Correa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1996352/","name":"Matthew Michael Carnahan"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

Made more gut wrenching is how they believed the ends justified the means. Mark Ruffalo tackles the lawyer with the conscience wonderfully. Suffering under the weight of what he must do and what then envelops his small world. It's heroic in how much he does sacrifice and let's face it, these stories don't end well. What director Haynes does is put a face to the not-on-the-books crime. And though, it only is a civil case somehow you sense the frustration of the town. Not played as rubes but believing that a massive corporation who funded and gave perks to sustain the village wouldn't willingly destroy it. As we know now versus 1998, they knew...if not for simple morbid curiosity. Then sat on the information as it fed the machine decades later, we are now more informed and much more paranoid. Everything we eat or touch or...breathe we are closer to death. I was in that area in 1998...and the news then spent less time on it then I recall. As a college bound student, I heard murmurs of DuPont and jokes were made of this. Now...it seems bitterly grim. How many lives were destroyed because of shady dealings. When you peel the onion, you do weep. I love this flick. The flavor of that era is pitch perfect. The backroads of an industrial town, built under poor chemistry just sweats disease. And you walk out angered by it. The fight continues to this day.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"environmental pollution,water pollution,lawyer as protagonist,chemical pollution,chemical contamination","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3717512985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZDdmMGMtN2I4ZC00NDFiLTlkNWUtY2YxM2MzNjU0NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZDdmMGMtN2I4ZC00NDFiLTlkNWUtY2YxM2MzNjU0NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by the true story of Robert Bilott, an attorney who took on the DuPont company in an environmental suit exposing a decades-long history of chemical pollution in drinking water.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0749263/","name":"Mark Ruffalo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0783031/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484360/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10164264/","name":"Nathaniel Rich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3918350/","name":"Mario Correa","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1996352/","name":"Matthew Michael Carnahan"],"duration":"PT2H6M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc:
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dr_Sagan"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well balanced movie...","reviewBody":"W.T.F. is a movie which tries to belong in too many genres simultaneously, including Comedy, Drama, Romance, War, Action, Documentary, and has a statement to make about pretty much everything including long-distance relationships, politics, professionalism, cultural differences etc. etc.

Without excelling in any of that, it manages to be a well balanced movie in the 110 minutes of its duration.

Tina Fey plays Kim Barker, a real person and an actual journalist, who is dissatisfying from her career covering low profile stories, and decides to go to Afghanistan as a war correspondent for a few months, or so she thought...

The movie has a good structure. It starts as a comedy, something you might expect because of the main actress, but soon the situations become real and more dramatic.

The rest of the cast includes well known actors like Alfred Molina, Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman and Margot Robbie.

Overall: Don't expect a comedy because of Tina Fey. It starts like that but it evolves to other genres really quick. It might not be a great movie but it's not boring and you get something out of the inner journey of the protagonist. How easy is to feel unnatural situations as normal when you are a long way from home..."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-04","keywords":"afghanistan,journalist,karaoke,dancing,infidelity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132324889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the Kim Barker's memoir, Tina Fey plays a journalist reporting from war-town Afghanistan and Pakistan."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275486/","name":"Tina Fey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013731/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199243/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061622/","name":"Robert Carlock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5092324/","name":"Kim Barker"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2000-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film shouldn't be panned","reviewBody":"I say that one line summary not in the meaning you should watch this film in widescreen, but in that this film isn't as bad as some people say. Sure it might not have the ultimate originality of the 1st (of course), but it is still entertaining, one of the best of 1989. This time, we see 5 years later where the Ghostbusters parted ways (Venkman to a Talk show, Spengler to a child psychologist and Stanz as a book store owner) but are put back together because of new activity in the paranormal that could end the world (courtesy of a painting named Vigo). Then, comedy ensues with great visual effects to match. Still pretty funny (the talk show scene with Chloe Webb is utterly hilarious), but maybe just a tad lesser than the first. A-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":190914,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Friday's Child
Wolny duch
Friday's Child
programme.desc:
Friday's Child: Directed by A.J. Edwards. With Tye Sheridan, Imogen Poots, Caleb Landry Jones, Jeffrey Wright. Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5342090/","name":"Friday's Child","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTViMWFhNjEtODgxMy00MWQ0LWI0M2MtYTdhNTE5NWM3NGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzY1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5342090/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"an artistic flick","reviewBody":"If you feel fragile, dont view this film, because its a socialrealistic gem for the scholard and artseeking part of the audience. its an uncomfortable saga about a young man that has aged out of the foster care system, and is thrown out to the wolfes in the jungle of real life and danger.

its a film that mirrors the weakneses sosciety has when it comes to the orphans among us, they are met with demands everywhere, and the odds they have to win this race are very low so, as with this main character, he is leaning up to the wall of law, having his mugshots doen. its a somewhat psychedelic chaotic way of life and living presented , and its a heavy piece of art to watch. the score eventually also amplifies this feeling, and in the end your deemed to carry it with you in your conciousness for weeks and years to come. the acting are well done, but the story are like an ekg-diagram with extreme ups and downs.

the grumpy old man might have missed the point, but it will not be a rewatch, its too saggy for me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":841,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"love,foster care,orphan,abandonment issues,emancipation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Friday's Child","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2967650073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1782299/","name":"Imogen Poots"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. Edwards"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0657444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0603497/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. Sugar Daddy
programme.desc:
Sugar Daddy: Directed by Wendy Morgan. With Kelly McCormack, Colm Feore, Amanda Brugel, Ishan Davé. Darren, a young talented musician, dreams of making music like nobody has before. But she's broke. Desperate for cash, she signs up to a paid-dating website, throwing herself down a dark path that shapes her music with it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7260052/","name":"Sugar Daddy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1YWFlZjUtODJkNC00YTYzLTk4NGItOTczNDgwNTg2ZDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc0MTgzMzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Darren, a young talented musician, dreams of making music like nobody has before. But she's broke. Desperate for cash, she signs up to a paid-dating website, throwing herself down a dark path that shapes her music with it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7260052/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paperpetter"},"dateCreated":"2021-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow burn","reviewBody":"If you are expecting some trash expose exploiting victim culture, you should turn away and go find yourself a bucket and cry your tears into it as you binge watch animal rescue videos. No judgement of course.

Kelly McCormack brings Darren into solid form. A constant mess juxtaposed on the narrow ledge of life and morality. Her performance of a train wreck is addictive. Darren is nervous, fleshy, transient yet heavy like a boulder on your chest.

The pace and the cuts have great direction. The cinematography matches. It is a slow burn, that leaves a mark.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":287,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-08","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sugar Daddy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi632012825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg0Zjk1YjQtZDUwNC00MjQ3LWE3MTUtNDA5NWVhMjRiZWU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg0Zjk1YjQtZDUwNC00MjQ3LWE3MTUtNDA5NWVhMjRiZWU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3080168/","name":"Kelly McCormack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272173/","name":"Colm Feore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115760/","name":"Amanda Brugel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7510412/","name":"Wendy Morgan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0241981/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0220814/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0458957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3080168/","name":"Kelly McCormack"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Desperate for cash, she signs up to a paid-dating website, throwing herself down a dark path that shapes her music with it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7260052/","name":"Sugar Daddy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1YWFlZjUtODJkNC00YTYzLTk4NGItOTczNDgwNTg2ZDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc0MTgzMzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Darren, a young talented musician, dreams of making music like nobody has before. But she's broke. Desperate for cash, she signs up to a paid-dating website, throwing herself down a dark path that shapes her music with it.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7260052/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"paperpetter","dateCreated":"2021-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow burn","reviewBody":"If you are expecting some trash expose exploiting victim culture, you should turn away and go find yourself a bucket and cry your tears into it as you binge watch animal rescue videos. No judgement of course.

Kelly McCormack brings Darren into solid form. A constant mess juxtaposed on the narrow ledge of life and morality. Her performance of a train wreck is addictive. Darren is nervous, fleshy, transient yet heavy like a boulder on your chest.

The pace and the cuts have great direction. The cinematography matches. It is a slow burn, that leaves a mark.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":287,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-08","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sugar Daddy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi632012825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg0Zjk1YjQtZDUwNC00MjQ3LWE3MTUtNDA5NWVhMjRiZWU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg0Zjk1YjQtZDUwNC00MjQ3LWE3MTUtNDA5NWVhMjRiZWU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3080168/","name":"Kelly McCormack","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272173/","name":"Colm Feore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115760/","name":"Amanda Brugel"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7510412/","name":"Wendy Morgan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0241981/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0220814/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0458957/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3080168/","name":"Kelly McCormack"],"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Watch List
Lista
Watch List
programme.desc: Watch List: Directed by Ben Rekhi. With Arthur Acuña, Bernard Carritero, Alessandra de Rossi, Jake Macapagal. After her husband is mysteriously killed in the drug wars of the Philippines, a widowed mother of three must confront her own darkness to protect her children from further harm." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8512120/","name":"Watch List","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRhMzUyNzEtOGUzNC00MDFmLThjMmItNmJiNWIyZmU4MWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE2MjUwNTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"After her husband is mysteriously killed in the drug wars of the Philippines, a widowed mother of three must confront her own darkness to protect her children from further harm.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8512120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alain-kapel5"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid thriller","reviewBody":"Watch List is a solid crime thriller from the Philippines. It's lean and mean, a bit melodramatic in a few scenes, but also tough to stomach for its cruel depiction of corruption and murderous police units. Viewers follow a woman who loses her husband after he gets shot by unknown assailants. This prompts her to try and look for his murderers, and her search leads her to a police inspector who promises they will be found if she agrees to work for him as an informant. However, she soon realizes this also includes being part of a hit squad... the plot moves forward with no stop gaps after this point. It's a straightforward film that dabbles in complicated real life issues revolving around the Philippines' uncompromising police operations. Drug users and dealers are taken out with little thought given to their current affairs. If they're on the ominous drug watch list, it's uncertain how long they have left before a hit squad comes for them. Acting is convincing and cinematography vivid and gritty, especially in nighttime scenes, further amplifying the film's tense and morally grey narrative. Some of the more apparent flaws here include a feeling of predictability, as many events are easy to foresee, while the film also tends to state the obvious in some of the dialogues. This doesn't detract from the overall impression, though, that Watch List is a pretty good film that should appeal to most crime thriller fans.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-02-19","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch List","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4117675545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU2Nzg4MGUtOTIyZi00NTEyLWI3NDYtMTA3NTEwOTU3NTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU2Nzg4MGUtOTIyZi00NTEyLWI3NDYtMTA3NTEwOTU3NTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010355/","name":"Arthur Acuña"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6041424/","name":"Bernard Carritero"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211278/","name":"Alessandra de Rossi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1266863/","name":"Ben Rekhi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0146372/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0799784/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1266863/","name":"Ben Rekhi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2891978/","name":"Rona Lean Sales"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: La vérité: Directed by Hirokazu Koreeda. With Catherine Deneuve, Juliette Binoche, Ethan Hawke, Clémentine Grenier. A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8323120/","name":"La vérité","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJjMTVhMzMtOTQwNC00MzVkLWE3YjMtMjkwYTQ0YzEyMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8323120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"'My memories, my book'...","reviewBody":"If you wrote your own book to tell your own story how close would your memories be to reality and how much would you conjure up, especially in relation to your relations and relationships. An incisive piece of film making that may lead you to further reflection of your own, on how you've arrived at where you are today and any distortions you may have invented for sustenance, survival and to cover and embalm the scars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6039,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-11","keywords":"aging actress,acting,tortoise,dog,title is not in english","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1405009689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlmODk2MjktMWNmNC00M2U1LWJkOTUtMjUwNGJiMDVhZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlmODk2MjktMWNmNC00M2U1LWJkOTUtMjUwNGJiMDVhZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000366/","name":"Catherine Deneuve"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466153/","name":"Hirokazu Koreeda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029856/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0567389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0705123/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466153/","name":"Hirokazu Koreeda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7408787/","name":"Ken Liu"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6793710/","name":"El crack cero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU1M2U4OWUtZTQ5OS00OWM1LTljN2EtMWJmZDgxNzUwZGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6793710/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"r-95017"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty bad","reviewBody":"Filmed in black and white, the acting is pretty woeful, it's difficult to want to pay attention when you're constantly confronted with examples or poor editing. It's so bad at times it made me wonder if it's deliberate.

The script has dramatic style to it, adding to the abstract lack of warmth for the characters. I get that he is a PI but I hope nobody has ever needed to look into the distance so many times in 2 hours.

I think it's also generally inconsistent, revelling in what I imagine were seen as character development and setting the seen comes across as predictable. The Story of Racheltjie De Beer
programme.desc: The Story of Racheltjie De Beer: Directed by Matthys Boshoff. With Sandra Prinsloo, Marius Weyers, Charlie Bouguenon, Antoinette Louw. South African wilderness 1800's. Five years after their mother's death, preadolescent Rachel and 5-year-old Jamie find themselves on their way to the virgin gold fields with their father Herman as he tries to start a new life. When Jamie goes missing in a freak blizzard, Rachel braves the snowstorm to search for her little brother in the 19th-century South-African wilderness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2188925/","name":"The Story of Racheltjie De Beer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTRjZTg1N2UtYzQ1My00ZGNhLWJkOTUtMDAzZGQ5MDQ5NjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQzMTQwOTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"South African wilderness 1800's. programme.desc:
El crack cero: Directed by José Luis Garci. With Carlos Santos, Miguel Ángel Muñoz, Luisa Gavasa, María Cantuel. In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6793710/","name":"El crack cero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU1M2U4OWUtZTQ5OS00OWM1LTljN2EtMWJmZDgxNzUwZGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6793710/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"r-95017"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty bad","reviewBody":"Filmed in black and white, the acting is pretty woeful, it's difficult to want to pay attention when you're constantly confronted with examples or poor editing. It's so bad at times it made me wonder if it's deliberate.

The script has dramatic style to it, adding to the abstract lack of warmth for the characters. I get that he is a PI but I hope nobody has ever needed to look into the distance so many times in 2 hours.

I think it's also generally inconsistent, revelling in what I imagine were seen as character development and setting the seen comes across as predictable. programme.title: Intemperie
Pod gołym niebem
Intemperie
programme.desc: Intemperie: Directed by Benito Zambrano. With Luis Tosar, Luis Callejo, Jaime López, Vicente Romero. In a tyrannical and oppressive Spain of misery and poorness, a child starts a runaway looking for freedom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8406744/","name":"Intemperie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc5NmM3MWItZGJkZS00NGVlLThhMDctOTcwYTYyMGQzNWU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDI3MDY3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a tyrannical and oppressive Spain of misery and poorness, a child starts a runaway looking for freedom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8406744/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ok_english_bt"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hardly an original theme ... still a darn good (Spanish) western!","reviewBody":"Weren't a lot of the original 'spaghetti' westerns shot in Spain? You can see why from the rugged dusty landscapes of Andalucia Benito Zambrano uses in 'Intemperie'. Rather clumsily titled 'Out in the Open' in English, doesn't really capture the essence of this chase western, 'Runaway' or 'On The Run' would be better. Without wanting to repeat the information provided by other reviews which is excellent, just wanted to add my voice to those who enjoyed the film. The 3 leads are outstanding and worthy of note. What an actor Luis Tosar is, in this role playing the war veteran turned nomadic herdsman 'Moor', so much screen presence, but also Jaime López is compelling as the child runaway, and Luis Callejo chillingly psychotic in the role of the cruel landholder. Many other aspects of the film are admirable, I'll leave people to make up their own minds ... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1221,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"kid,child,nameless character,shepherd,wasteland","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3323706393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ0N2VlMjktNTNhYS00NTJjLWE5MTgtYjc5NmFkYzBjMzY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ0N2VlMjktNTNhYS00NTJjLWE5MTgtYjc5NmFkYzBjMzY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869088/","name":"Luis Tosar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130429/","name":"Luis Callejo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7235691/","name":"Jaime López"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952583/","name":"Benito Zambrano"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048117/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071642/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0809116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5488769/","name":"Jesús Carrasco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2515343/","name":"Daniel Remón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1932665/","name":"Pablo Remón"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

A popular undergrad faking cancer struggles to maintain her secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9169036/","name":"White Lie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRiNDFhYjgtNDk0Yi00YWNlLTk5YTQtODY4YTE5M2Q0YjRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzMwOTk0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A popular undergrad faking cancer struggles to maintain her secret.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9169036/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cause & Effect...","reviewBody":"The best cinema always gets you thinking and if a film ever had the power to do that you've just found it. How you scale and share your empathy between cause and effect might reveal a lot about the way you perceive the world around you. On the one hand - she'll get what's coming to her, deceitful so and so and, on the other, what has happened to cause this young woman to behave this way. Either way, whatever your bias, I think you'll find it hard to ignore that at the centre of this is an outstanding and convincing performance from Kacey Rohl.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-10","keywords":"lesbianism,lesbian interest,text message,female protagonist,written by director","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi861191193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5NmY2YjQtNGYwYi00YzEwLWEzNzEtOGVlMTkwZWNlYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5NmY2YjQtNGYwYi00YzEwLWEzNzEtOGVlMTkwZWNlYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A popular undergrad faking cancer struggles to maintain her secret."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821782/","name":"Kacey Rohl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3806097/","name":"Amber Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233027/","name":"Martin Donovan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908135/","name":"Yonah Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3192986/","name":"Calvin Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0259703/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0710840/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0782667/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908135/","name":"Yonah Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3192986/","name":"Calvin Thomas"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Either way, whatever your bias, I think you'll find it hard to ignore that at the centre of this is an outstanding and convincing performance from Kacey Rohl.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-10","keywords":"lesbianism,lesbian interest,text message,female protagonist,written by director","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi861191193","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5NmY2YjQtNGYwYi00YzEwLWEzNzEtOGVlMTkwZWNlYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5NmY2YjQtNGYwYi00YzEwLWEzNzEtOGVlMTkwZWNlYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A popular undergrad faking cancer struggles to maintain her secret.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821782/","name":"Kacey Rohl","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3806097/","name":"Amber Anderson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233027/","name":"Martin Donovan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908135/","name":"Yonah Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3192986/","name":"Calvin Thomas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0259703/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0710840/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0782667/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908135/","name":"Yonah Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3192986/","name":"Calvin Thomas"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: A Million Little Pieces: Directed by Sam Taylor-Johnson. With Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Odessa Young, Giovanni Ribisi. A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0427543/","name":"A Million Little Pieces","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDhhMTA3ODYtZGEzZC00MzgwLWEyYzktZjVkMDlkYmRjMTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0427543/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sort of gets there, in the end....","reviewBody":"As long as we remember that this is a work of fiction, then it isn't a bad little runner. Aaron Taylor-Johnson and an extremely dapper Billy Bob Thornton engender some interest in their characters and as such, you do find yourself starting to care for them. ATJ plays an out-of-control druggie with little, he thinks, to live for; is sent to a rehab centre and meets Lilly (Odessa Young). The film develops sensitively - if, at times, angrily - and does offer us a little considered insight into the worlds of the carers and the cared-for. Nothing you won't have seen (or, likely, read) before and it is maybe just a bit too long, but it does deserve a viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2499,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"male full frontal nudity,title directed by female,shower,drugs,addiction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Million Little Pieces","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980442649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdhNGU1ZmMtMjVmNS00NjdmLWJkOTgtY2JkNzVkMDg4ZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdhNGU1ZmMtMjVmNS00NjdmLWJkOTgtY2JkNzVkMDg4ZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093951/","name":"Aaron Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3747611/","name":"Odessa Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853374/","name":"Sam Taylor-Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0554532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0583900/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093951/","name":"Aaron Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853374/","name":"Sam Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294580/","name":"James Frey"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Bis die Welt einen Rand bekommt: Directed by Daniel Bertram. With Lisa Hagmeister, Günther Harder, Alicia Valencia Pollex. programme.title: Intemperie
Pod gołym niebem
Intemperie
programme.desc: Intemperie: Directed by Benito Zambrano. With Luis Tosar, Luis Callejo, Jaime López, Vicente Romero. In a tyrannical and oppressive Spain of misery and poorness, a child starts a runaway looking for freedom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8406744/","name":"Intemperie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc5NmM3MWItZGJkZS00NGVlLThhMDctOTcwYTYyMGQzNWU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDI3MDY3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a tyrannical and oppressive Spain of misery and poorness, a child starts a runaway looking for freedom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8406744/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ok_english_bt"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hardly an original theme ... still a darn good (Spanish) western!","reviewBody":"Weren't a lot of the original 'spaghetti' westerns shot in Spain? You can see why from the rugged dusty landscapes of Andalucia Benito Zambrano uses in 'Intemperie'. Rather clumsily titled 'Out in the Open' in English, doesn't really capture the essence of this chase western, 'Runaway' or 'On The Run' would be better. Without wanting to repeat the information provided by other reviews which is excellent, just wanted to add my voice to those who enjoyed the film. The 3 leads are outstanding and worthy of note. What an actor Luis Tosar is, in this role playing the war veteran turned nomadic herdsman 'Moor', so much screen presence, but also Jaime López is compelling as the child runaway, and Luis Callejo chillingly psychotic in the role of the cruel landholder. Many other aspects of the film are admirable, I'll leave people to make up their own minds ... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1221,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"kid,child,nameless character,shepherd,wasteland","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3323706393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ0N2VlMjktNTNhYS00NTJjLWE5MTgtYjc5NmFkYzBjMzY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ0N2VlMjktNTNhYS00NTJjLWE5MTgtYjc5NmFkYzBjMzY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869088/","name":"Luis Tosar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130429/","name":"Luis Callejo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7235691/","name":"Jaime López"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952583/","name":"Benito Zambrano"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048117/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071642/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0809116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5488769/","name":"Jesús Carrasco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2515343/","name":"Daniel Remón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1932665/","name":"Pablo Remón"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Mes jours de gloire: Directed by Antoine de Bary. With Vincent Lacoste, Emmanuelle Devos, Christopher Lambert, Noée Abita. An actor who enjoyed success in his youth finds his career and life in a downward spiral as he gets older." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9625632/","name":"Mes jours de gloire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTIwY2E1ZDQtYTVkYS00ZjkxLWI5MTAtNDQ1MTk1ZjU3NGEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ3Njg3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An actor who enjoyed success in his youth finds his career and life in a downward spiral as he gets older.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9625632/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Whatever happened to Adrian Palatine ?","reviewBody":"A missed opportunity ;the subject was appealing :a child actor coming to terms with the fact that he's no longer a star but a failed thespian ;everyone's not Elizabeth Taylor or Mickey Rooney.

Unfortunately , the subject is skimmed over , leaving the lion's share to the hero''s sexuality ; no hint at former glories after the beginning ; instead ,de rigueur so called funny scenes in the pharmacy or in the doctor's office ,dealing with the hero's impotence , with a total lack of finesse and decency (it's all in your head ,doc says ); it's difficult to feel for this bland young man , taking refuge in dad's and mom's home : both are caricatures of what the French call "bourgeois bohèmes ": Christophe(r) Lambert and Emmanuelle Devos are given extremely poor parts, with underwritten lines: the expected confession of the mom takes the biscuit ,but restores Adrien 's manliness !

In consequence, the scenes where the former star rehearses scenes from a hypothetical movie about the life of ...Charles de Gaulle retain a certain humor (the scene of the moustache is perhaps the funniest in the whole story),and the life of France 's greatest man of the twentieth century is given an almost tongue in cheek treatment.One can also save the excellent scene in the therapy center with the black psychologist whose words ring truer than the mother's interminable "I've been through it all too "monologue : it's the only scene in which Vincent Lacoste really rises up to the occasion ,his jerky lines go straight to the heart .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-02-26","keywords":"male programme.title: A Million Little Pieces
Milion małych kawałków
A Million Little Pieces
programme.desc: A Million Little Pieces: Directed by Sam Taylor-Johnson. With Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Odessa Young, Giovanni Ribisi. A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0427543/","name":"A Million Little Pieces","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDhhMTA3ODYtZGEzZC00MzgwLWEyYzktZjVkMDlkYmRjMTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg2NjQwMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0427543/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sort of gets there, in the end....","reviewBody":"As long as we remember that this is a work of fiction, then it isn't a bad little runner. Aaron Taylor-Johnson and an extremely dapper Billy Bob Thornton engender some interest in their characters and as such, you do find yourself starting to care for them. ATJ plays an out-of-control druggie with little, he thinks, to live for; is sent to a rehab centre and meets Lilly (Odessa Young). The film develops sensitively - if, at times, angrily - and does offer us a little considered insight into the worlds of the carers and the cared-for. Nothing you won't have seen (or, likely, read) before and it is maybe just a bit too long, but it does deserve a viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2499,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"male full frontal nudity,title directed by female,shower,drugs,addiction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Million Little Pieces","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980442649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdhNGU1ZmMtMjVmNS00NjdmLWJkOTgtY2JkNzVkMDg4ZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdhNGU1ZmMtMjVmNS00NjdmLWJkOTgtY2JkNzVkMDg4ZjY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093951/","name":"Aaron Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3747611/","name":"Odessa Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853374/","name":"Sam Taylor-Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0554532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0583900/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093951/","name":"Aaron Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853374/","name":"Sam Taylor-Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294580/","name":"James Frey"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mon frère
Mój koniec. Twój początek
Mein Ende. Dein Anfang.
programme.desc: Mon frère: Directed by Julien Abraham. With MHD, Darren Muselet, Aïssa Maïga, Jalil Lespert. Because he wanted to protect his little brother from a father too violent, Teddy, a young man without history, is accused of the murder of his father and is sent to a closed educational center, waiting for his trial for parricide . He then plunges into a brutal universe of which he does not know the rules." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9095526/","name":"Mon frère","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmViODhhNGYtZTA1OC00ODQ2LTkwZGMtNjE5NDk0NGIxOTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Because he wanted to protect his little brother from a father too violent, Teddy, a young man without history, is accused of the murder of his father and is sent to a closed educational center, waiting for his trial for parricide . H","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9095526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Protecting your brother","reviewBody":"There's more to certain things than meet the eye. A powerful story about two brothers who have a rough and violent father. Sometimes there is only one escape from that, as wrong as that may be. Not that I condone violence of any sort. This movie feels real and we do get intertwining storylines that further our understanding of why and how we got where we are.\n\nOnce in the system, the harsh reality is that the world is rough and the strong ones make up the rules. programme.title: Dni mojej chwały
Mes jours de gloire
programme.desc: Adrian (Vincent Lacoste) był dawniej dziecięcym aktorem. Liczył na sławę, uznanie i życie na wysokim poziomie. Czas zweryfikował te przekonania. Niedługo Adrian kończy trzydzieści lat. Jego losy potoczyły się inaczej, niż oczekiwał. Życie miłosne to pasmo klęsk, a na skutek innych problemów musi zamieszkać u rodziców.

programme.title: Lara
Lara
programme.desc: Lara: Directed by Jan-Ole Gerster. With Tom Schilling, Mala Emde, Rainer Bock, Maria Dragus. It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of control." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7275830/","name":"Lara","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAxYTk0MjctN2M4YS00ZDA0LWE1MDctNzhiMjA5NjA2MmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyNjM3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of cont","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7275830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CitizenDevi"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great and different follow-up to Oh Boy.","reviewBody":"The first movie I ever saw at a film festival, albeit it that the Ludwigsburger Lichtspielliebe is a very very new and very very very small and adorable little film festival with only one screening room. But that counts and is all very well done, and the director and lead actor showed up after the film for a fairly lengthy discussion. Lara was one of my most anticipated movies of this year because I love the first film Jan-Ole Gerster did, Oh Boy. This one yet again tells a big story in a down to earth and believable form where the way characters act and speak tells you all you need to know about them, and then some. Yet again it's also about family and being in a bad place in life. Lara, different from his first film, is for a big part about passion and creativity, and it's beautifully directed and written, and of course the performances are great. I'm very happy it turned out so well and hope it won't take Gerster seven years again to put out a new film. I don't know what took him so long, maybe it was just about financing. Anyway, see this one if you can please, it's definitely worth a watch and so full of life, never boring, always being real, and you can tell they really cared about making this as good as it can be. This is a film everyone will be able to get something out of. Fittingly, at one point a character thinks to himself, does the world really need my music or has it been done already and is pointless. I can tell you Lara is thankfully anything but pointless."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-11-07","keywords":"60th birthday,mother son conflict,piano teacher,suicidal thoughts,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi977779737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3605549/","name":"Mala Emde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0090674/","name":"Rainer Bock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1673756/","name":"Jan-Ole Gerster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051615/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002254/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092424/","name":"Blaz Kutin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stille hjerte
Spokój w sercu
Stille hjerte
programme.desc:
Stille hjerte: Directed by Bille August. With Ghita Nørby, Paprika Steen, Danica Curcic, Morten Grunwald. Three generations of a family coming together over a weekend. A sick mother's wish to die before her disease worsens gets harder to handle as old conflicts come to the surface." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3335048/","name":"Stille hjerte","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU0OTE1YzgtMGQ1My00ZmNiLThkMWQtZTkwMmNiZmYyNjFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYxOTY1Njg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three generations of a family coming together over a weekend. A sick mother's wish to die before her disease worsens gets harder to handle as old conflicts come to the surface.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3335048/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JvH48"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent situational plot around euthanasia, with ample complications and unexpected turns of events. Everyone's motives and reasoning are portrayed very well","reviewBody":"Saw this at the Noordelijk film festival 2015 in Leeuwarden (NL). It all starts with a small family gathering over the weekend, nothing out of the ordinary at first sight. Rather than getting into the usual annoyances and uneasy relationships common with family in law, or old bones to pick between brothers and sisters, the weekend starts unproblematic. Plans have been made previously for a do-it-yourself form of euthanasia, which is illegal almost everywhere. Yet we learn that everyone involved has accepted the procedure. The timing is such that the mother can take the pills by herself, without help, something not possible anymore when her illness worsens, the latter due in 1 or 2 months. Her husband can say that she did it all by herself while he took a walk, particularly important as a precaution because as a doctor he certainly cannot be suspected of any active involvement in such a procedure.

The group of relatives assembled for the weekend in question is well chosen, from a plot perspective, with very diverse characters and attitudes, albeit that there are not so many family members that we lose track on the respective opinions and motives. In spite of the a priori agreement on the whole process, we observe that some are getting cold feet and we see them wanting to postpone or even dismiss the whole procedure. Reasons for it vary but are certainly genuine and we can follow their trains of thought very well. These withdrawals happen with one after the other, each with different motives, and each eventually coming along and prepared to stick to the original plan. It sounds confusing but the script is well designed and the timing is perfect.

One example, to illustrate the sort of objections, is that one daughter regrets that she did not spend enough time with her mother in the past, having given more thought to her career and other priorities elsewhere. Now that she has more time on her hands, she welcomes the opportunity to renew the relationship with her mother, and to discuss matters of mutual interest. This is something that I can understand fully, as having similar ideas myself over having not spent sufficient time with my parents, in spite of them devoting ample time to me when I was young. A second argument of the daughter is that doctors can be wrong in their predictions, in other words that the planned euthanasia is much too soon, and that medicine can be invented in the meantime to prolong her life for many years to come. All this is just an example of aforementioned turns of events, everything just rational and understandable, yet endangering the plans that were so well thought through.

It is an achievement in itself that it all happened on screen within 97 minutes, in a limited time span in which not a second was wasted, letting events pass by in a logical order and evenly spread over time. Don't assume an overall gloomy atmosphere, since there is ample humor included in spite of the circumstances.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-11-13","keywords":"weekend,family relationships,euthanasia","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639152/","name":"Ghita Nørby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824785/","name":"Paprika Steen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4439530/","name":"Danica Curcic"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000806/","name":"Bille August"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249327/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054911/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048411/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1311535/","name":"Christian Torpe"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="
